column5: Is anyone out there centre pinning yet?  How are the rivers if you are?
Lots of people pinnin' it. Too many for my liking actually, my 3 favourite pools were packed yesterday!
PURE MUD!!! WILL BE FOR DAYS YET

The two spots I checked today had a couple inches of visibility but the current was going about 60MPH LOL. So I bottom fished for 6 hours and tested out my rain gear, since I never saw a fish except for a tragic looking salmon swimming around that apparently forgot to die after spawning last fall.
have any of you pinners out there float fished for brookies anywhere???
